title: Katy Luxury Apartments
posting_body: Haven at Highland Knolls is where you will find all the comforts of a real home.
With superior and unique architecture, combined with an amenity package that is second-to-none, this master planned community was designed to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.
Shopping, dining, prestigiously highly rated Katy ISD Schools, Starbucks, and Grocery stores are located just minutes from your front door!
Located directly across from Nottingham Country Park, Haven at Highland Knolls is ideal for walkers, joggers and those interested in morning/evening exercise getaways.
In addition, bike riders have easy access to the George Bush Hike and Bike Trail and Buffalo Bayou.

Haven at Highland Knolls, designed with an open concept floorplan, features 9ft ceilings, kitchen islands with granite countertops, bar seating, updated Kenmore appliances (double door fridge, microwave, dish washer and stove), faux wood & carpet combination flooring, garden tubs, spacious walk-in closets, and oversized private balconies.
All apartment homes include washers and dryers.
